features_page.hero_subtitle: Everything you need to find clients, manage leads, and grow your logistics business

core.title: Core Features
core.subtitle: Available on all plans, including the free trial

how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: Start finding clients in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Download & Sign Up
step1.desc: Install Truxel from App Store or Google Play. Create your free account and get 5 trial searches.

step2.title: Enable GPS & Search
step2.desc: Turn on your location and let Truxel find companies within 5km automatically.

step3.title: View Results
step3.desc: Browse company details, contact information, and exact locations on the map.

step4.title: Make Contact
step4.desc: Reach out via email, WhatsApp, or phone using our pre-filled templates.

pro.title: Advanced Features
pro.subtitle: Unlock powerful tools with Pro tier subscription

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Download Truxel today and start finding clients instantly with 5 free trial searches
